V0307_01_00_00_0.text: I can see that you're a Duelist.

V0307_01_00_00_1.text: So I will challenge you to a Duel.

V0307_01_00_01_0.text: The cards will decide our fate.

V0307_01_00_02_0.text:
We are the Plana.
The ones who will remake this world.

V0307_01_00_03_0.text: Yugi, maybe you can join the Plana too.

V0307_01_00_04_0.text: Yugi, I know you and the Pharaoh used to be one.

V0307_01_00_05_0.text: What you are doing is dangerous.

V0307_01_00_05_1.text: I can't warn you enough, Kaiba.

V0307_01_00_06_0.text: Kaiba, I can't let your wishes comes true.

V0307_01_00_07_0.text: Diva, you must let go of your revenge.

V0307_01_00_08_1.text: If you don't stop, it will destroy you.

V0307_01_00_10_0.text: You're the evil presence inside the Millennium Ring!

V0307_05_00_00_0.text: This card will change the future!

V0307_07_09_00_0.text: I flip over my face-down card!

V0307_08_00_00_0.text: I activate the Continuous Spell, Cubic Karma!

V0307_08_00_02_0.text: I banish Cubic Karma from the Graveyard to use its effect!

V0307_08_00_03_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Cubic Wave!

V0307_08_00_04_0.text: I banish Cubic Wave and Cubic monsters from my Graveyard!

V0307_08_00_04_1.text: For each Cubic I banish, your monster is neutralized!

V0307_08_00_05_0.text: I activate the Continuous Spell, Cubic Dharma!

V0307_08_00_07_0.text: I banish Cubic Dharma from the Graveyard to use its effect!

V0307_08_00_08_0.text: I activate Cubic Rebirth to neutralize your monster!

V0307_08_00_08_1.text: And Special Summon a Cubic monster from my hand!

V0307_08_00_09_0.text: I activate the Continuous Trap, Cubic Mandala!

V0307_08_00_09_1.text: Your monsters may revive, but they're neutralized!

V0307_08_00_10_0.text: I activate my Trap Card, Unification of the Cubic Lords!

V0307_08_00_11_0.text: I banish Unification of the Cubic Lords to activate it!

V0307_08_00_12_0.text:
I activate my Trap Card!
Cubic Ascension!

V0307_08_00_13_0.text: I banish Cubic Ascension from my Graveyard to activate it!

V0307_08_00_14_0.text:
I activate my Trap Card!
Cubic Omen!

V0307_08_00_14_1.text: For every Cubic monster I have, your monster is neutralized!

V0307_08_00_15_0.text: I activate Cubic Omen by banishing it from the Graveyard!

V0307_09_00_00_0.text: Duza the Meteor Cubic Vessel's effect activates!

V0307_09_00_01_0.text: Vijam has escaped to a dimension that you cannot attack.

V0307_09_00_01_1.text: And renders your monster's effects and offense useless.

V0307_09_00_02_0.text: Vijam leaves this dimension and neutralizes your monster!

V0307_09_00_04_0.text: Dark Garnex the Cubic Beast's effect activates!

V0307_09_00_05_0.text: I activate Blade Garoodia the Cubic Beast's effect!

V0307_09_00_06_0.text: Buster Gundil the Cubic Behemoth's effect activates!

V0307_09_00_07_0.text: Geira Guile the Cubic King's effect activates!

V0307_09_00_08_0.text: Vulcan Dragni the Cubic King's effect activates!

V0307_09_00_09_0.text: Indiora Doom Volt the Cubic Emperor's effect activates!

V0307_09_00_10_0.text: Due to Crimson Nova's effect, it can attack again!

V0307_09_00_11_0.text: Crimson Nova's effect deals damage to all players!

V0307_09_00_12_1.text: Your LP are cut in half!

V0307_09_00_13_0.text: By destroying a monster, Trinity can attack again!

V0307_11_01_00_0.text: I Summon a monster in Defense Position!

V0307_13_00_02_0.text: I Special Summon Dark Garnex the Cubic Beast!

V0307_13_00_03_0.text: I Special Summon Blade Garoodia the Cubic Beast!

V0307_13_00_04_0.text: I Special Summon Buster Gundil the Cubic Behemoth!

V0307_13_00_05_0.text: I Special Summon Geira Guile the Cubic King!

V0307_13_00_06_0.text: I Special Summon Vulcan Dragni the Cubic King!

V0307_13_00_07_0.text: I Special Summon Indiora Doom Volt the Cubic Emperor!

V0307_13_00_08_0.text: I Special Summon Crimson Nova the Dark Cubic Lord!

V0307_13_00_09_0.text: Crimson Nova Trinity the Dark Cubic Lord!

V0307_19_00_00_0.text: Duza the Meteor Cubic Vessel attacks!

V0307_19_00_02_0.text: Dark Garnex the Cubic Beast! Attack!

V0307_19_00_03_0.text: Blade Garoodia the Cubic Beast attacks!

V0307_19_00_04_0.text: Attack, Buster Gundil the Cubic Behemoth!

V0307_19_00_05_0.text: Attack, Geira Guile the Cubic King!

V0307_19_00_06_0.text: Vulcan Dragni the Cubic King! Attack!

V0307_19_00_07_0.text: Go, Indiora Doom Volt the Cubic Emperor! Attack!

V0307_19_00_08_0.text: Attack, Crimson Nova the Dark Cubic Lord!

V0307_19_00_09_0.text: Crimson Nova Trinity the Dark Cubic Lord! Attack!

V0307_28_00_00_0.text: You were not the Duelist I'd hoped you'd be.

V0307_28_00_01_0.text:
Don't worry.
I won't send you to another dimension.

V0307_28_00_02_0.text: We desire to remake this world into a utopia.

V0307_28_00_02_1.text: So I don't understand why you'd interfere.

V0307_28_00_03_0.text: Master Shin taught us that fear can turn into hate.

V0307_28_00_04_0.text: Yugi, I believe you're one of the chosen ones.

V0307_28_00_04_1.text: You are one of the Plana.

V0307_28_00_05_0.text:
Yugi, please save my brother.
He is all that I have.

V0307_28_00_06_0.text: You will never become the Pharaoh.

V0307_28_00_07_0.text: Seto Kaiba, you cannot always get what you want.

V0307_28_00_08_1.text: There are those in this world who can help you!

V0307_28_00_09_0.text: Fear can only lead to hate.

V0307_28_00_09_1.text: So that is why I am not afraid of you.

V0307_29_00_01_0.text: I'll have nothing to fear when we remake this world.

V0307_29_00_03_0.text: I can tell that your cards are precious to you.

V0307_29_00_03_1.text: And extra precious to the Pharaoh.

V0307_29_00_04_0.text: Yugi, I will entrust you with my destiny.

V0307_29_00_05_0.text: I tried to stop you from making a grave mistake.

V0307_29_00_06_0.text: You must realize that even with every piece of the Puzzle...

V0307_29_00_06_1.text: Your hopes will not come true.

V0307_29_00_07_0.text: Diva, you must not give in to hate.

V0307_29_00_08_0.text:
Such power...
I failed, Master Shin.

V0307_30_00_00_0.text: I shall erase you from existence.

V0307_30_00_01_0.text: You can't exist if no one remembers you.

V0307_33_00_02_0.text: This is the power of the Plana!

V0307_34_00_00_0.text: The Plana carry on the will of Master Shin.

V0307_34_00_01_0.text: You have what it takes to join the Plana.

V0307_34_00_03_0.text: If you lose, you must vanish.

V0307_34_00_04_0.text: You controlled your spirit to lower its ATK?

V0307_34_00_06_0.text: Do you have the courage to step beyond what's possible?

V0307_34_00_07_0.text: You are not - and will never be - the Pharaoh.

V0307_32_00_00_0.text:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links...
Uniting Duelists worldwide!

V0307_32_00_01_0.text:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links...
A new dimension of gaming!

V0307_35_00_00_0.text: I will carry on the will of Master Shin.

V0307_35_00_01_0.text:
My name is Sera.
Let's create a new world together.

V0307_36_00_07_0.text: Yugi, you hold our destiny in your hands.

V0307_36_00_08_0.text: Yugi, you are the only one I can count on.
